text: Ingabaukhonanaaphakuniongaangabanesitiyaesineedatilisi zesundu, nezidiliya ekumpompoza amanzi phantsi kwazo, nazo zonke iintlobo zeziqhamo ezizezakhe apho kuso, abe yena efunyenwe kukwaluphala lo gama abantwana bakhe bebuthathaka (bengakwazi kuzenzela nto), sisuke (esi sitiya sakhe) sifikelwe ngumoya wesitshingitshane, size sitshe? Wenza njalo ke uAllâh ukucacisa imiqondiso yaKhe kuni khon’ukuze niqiqe
